__note__: This is file is autogenerated, do not edit it manually. For more info https://data.aoe4world.com/

data.name: Abbey of Kings
data.description:
Heals all nearby friendly units that are out of combat by +6 every 1 seconds.
Ordain up to 4 Lords of Lancaster, powerful melee leaders which increase the max health of nearby military units by +5% each. Queues production of a free Lord of Lancaster upon completion.
data.descriptionCN:
治疗附近所有脱离战斗的友方单位，每 1 秒生命值 +6。
最多任命 4 个兰开斯特领主，兰开斯特领主是强大的近战领袖，可以使附近所有军事单位的最大生命值 +5%。建造完成后为生产队列中添加一名免费的兰开斯特领主。

data.name: Archery Range
data.description: Produces ranged infantry units.
data.descriptionCN: 生产远程步兵单位。

data.name: Barracks
data.description: Produces melee infantry units.
data.descriptionCN: 生产近战步兵单位。

data.name: Berkshire Palace
data.description:
Acts as a Keep with increased health and powerful incendiary arrows. All weapons have 14.5 tiles of range.
Increases the maximum damage granted by a House Unified to +6. Also grants 3 Earl's Guard upon being fully constructed.
data.descriptionCN:
作为一个城堡使用，拥有更高的生命值和强大的燃烧箭。所有武器射程增加 14.5 格。
众志成城提供的最大伤害 +6。建造完成后还可获得 3 名伯爵护卫。

data.name: Blacksmith
data.description: Houses technology to improve infantry and cavalry.
data.descriptionCN: 可研究强化步兵和骑兵的科技。

data.name: Capital Town Center
data.description:
All Resources can be dropped off here. Produces Villagers, Scouts, and increases your maximum Population. Adds additional attacks while garrisoned.
Capital Town Centers can detect units stealth or disguises.
data.descriptionCN:
可在此存放所有资源。可生产村民、侦察兵，并提高人口上限。单位驻扎时可增加额外的攻击次数。
首都城镇中心可侦测匿踪或伪装单位。

data.name: Cathedral of St. Thomas
data.description: Build and defend a Wonder to secure victory. Rival civilizations will be aware of its construction and seek to destroy it.
data.descriptionCN: 建造并守护世界奇观可以获得胜利。敌方文明会察觉并设法摧毁你的世界奇观。

data.name: Dock
data.description:
Produces naval units.
Automatically repairs nearby damaged naval units.
Capable of holding up to three Fishing Ships.
data.descriptionCN:
生产海军单位。
自动修理附近受损的海军单位。
最多可容纳三艘渔船。
displayClassesCN: 军事和经济建筑、交易站

data.name: Farm
data.description:
Harvestable Food source. Use a Villager to gather Food from the Farm.
Only one Villager can work each Farm.
data.descriptionCN:
可采集的食物来源，利用村民即可从农田采集食物。
每块农田只能派遣一位村民耕作。

data.name: House
data.description: Increases your maximum Population.
data.descriptionCN: 提升您的人口上限。

data.name: Keep
data.description:
Heavy garrison and defensible position. Can be upgraded with weaponry. Adds additional attacks while garrisoned.
Grants 3 Earl's Guards upon being fully constructed.
data.descriptionCN:
重兵驻守，易守难攻。可进行武器升级。单位驻扎时可增加额外的攻击次数。
建造完成后可获得 3 名伯爵护卫。

data.name: King's College
data.description:
Reduces research costs of all technologies by -15%.
Contains unique Military technologies for House of Lancaster.
data.descriptionCN:
所有科技的研究成本 -15%。
包含兰开斯特王朝的独有军事科技。

data.name: Lancaster Castle
data.description:
Defensive Landmark that can do a one-time muster of units in each Age. The cost of mustering units is reduced by 50 resources per Manor.
Grants all Manors +500 health and an arrowslit emplacement.
data.descriptionCN:
防御地标，每个时代可以集结一次单位。每座庄园集结单位的成本 -50 资源。
赋予所有庄园 +500 生命值，以及一个射箭槽炮台。

data.name: Lumber Camp
data.description: Villagers can drop off Wood at this building. Houses technologies to improve Wood gathering.
data.descriptionCN: 村民可将木材存放于这座建筑。可研究提升木材采集效率的科技。

data.name: Manor
data.description:
Acts as a drop off building for all resource types. Passively generates 10 wood and 30 food per minute. Generates an additional 4 food and 2 wood for each nearby villager. 
Villagers only affect one Manor at a time.
Increases your maximum Population by +10.
data.descriptionCN:
可作为所有资源类型的存放建筑。每分钟可被动生产 10 木材和 30 食物。可为附近的每个村民额外生产 4 食物和 2 木材。
村民一次只影响一座庄园。
人口上限 +10。

data.name: Market
data.description: Allows the buying and selling of resources and produces the Trader.
data.descriptionCN: 可生产商人及买卖资源。

data.name: Mill
data.description: Villagers can drop off Food at this building. Houses technologies to improve Food gathering.
data.descriptionCN: 村民可将食物存放于这座建筑。可研究提升食物采集效率的科技。

data.name: Mining Camp
data.description: Villagers can drop off Stone and Gold at this building. Houses technologies to improve mining.
data.descriptionCN: 村民可将石料和黄金存放于这座建筑。可研究提升采矿效率的科技。

data.name: Monastery
data.description: Produces religious units and houses religious technologies. Starting in the Castle Age (III), religious units can pick up Relics and place them in this building to generate Gold.
data.descriptionCN: 生产宗教单位并可研究宗教科技。从城堡时代 (第三时代) 开始，宗教单位可拾取圣物并将其放置在此建筑中以产生黄金。

data.name: Outpost
data.description: Offers extensive line of sight and detects units stealth or disguises. Can be upgraded with weaponry and fortifications. Attacks while garrisoned.
data.descriptionCN: 可提供开阔的视野，侦测匿踪或伪装单位。可以升级武器和防御工事。单位驻扎时可进行攻击。

data.name: Palisade
data.description:
Light defensive wall for quickly fortifying an area.
Initially costs 21 Wood, with each additional section costing 7 Wood.
data.descriptionCN:
轻型的防御城墙，可快速为区域设防。
最初花费 21 木材，每增加一段则花费 7 木材。

data.name: Palisade Gate
data.description: Light defensive gate. Must be built on a Palisade Wall segment.
data.descriptionCN: 轻型防御城门。必须建造在木栅栏上。

data.name: Siege Workshop
data.description: Produces siege engines and powerful gunpowder units.
data.descriptionCN: 生产攻城器械和强大的火药单位。

data.name: Stable
data.description: Produces cavalry military units.
data.descriptionCN: 生产骑兵军事单位。

data.name: Stone Wall
data.description:
Sturdy wall that cannot be attacked by torches. 
Units on walls take 25% less damage from ranged attacks, 50% less damage from siege attacks, and their range is increased by +1.
data.descriptionCN:
坚固的城墙，火把无法攻击。
城墙上的单位受到远程攻击的伤害 -25%，攻城攻击的伤害 -50%，并且它们的射程 +1。

data.name: Stone Wall Gate
data.description:
Heavy defensive gate. Must be built on a Stone Wall segment.
Infantry can use the gate to access the top of the walls.
data.descriptionCN:
重型防御城门。必须建于石墙上。
步兵可利用城门前往城墙顶端。

data.name: Stone Wall Tower
data.description:
Heavy defensive tower that fires a springald. Must be built on a Stone Wall segment.
Infantry can use the tower to access the top of the walls.
data.descriptionCN:
防御坚实的箭塔，可发射扭力弩炮。必须建于石墙上。
步兵可利用箭塔前往城墙顶端。

data.name: The White Tower
data.description:
Acts as a Keep with all the behaviors, technologies, and bonuses.
Grants 3 Earl's Guard upon being fully constructed.
data.descriptionCN:
可作为城堡使用，具备其所有功能、科技以及加成。
建造完成后可获得 3 名伯爵护卫。

data.name: Town Center
data.description:
All Resources can be dropped off here. Produces Villagers, Scouts, and increases your maximum Population. Adds additional attacks while garrisoned.
Non-Capital Town Centers can't detect stealth or disguises.
Spawns 4 Sheep upon being fully constructed.
data.descriptionCN:
可在此存放所有资源。可生产村民、侦察兵，并提高人口上限。单位驻扎时可增加额外的攻击次数。
非首都城镇中心无法侦测匿踪或伪装。
完全建成后，生成 4 只绵羊。

data.name: University
data.description: Houses advanced technology that benefit the civilization.
data.descriptionCN: 可研究对整个文明有益的先进科技。

data.name: Wynguard Palace
data.description: Allows the production of 4 battalions: Wynguard Army, Earl's Retinue, Garrison Command, and Gunpowder Contingent.
data.descriptionCN: 可以生产 4 个营队：温嘉德军队、伯爵侍从、驻扎命令和火药分遣队。
